about_the_game:
Puzzle Game: Miko is an exciting and intriguing puzzle game for adults that will plunge you into a world of sensuality, passion and a variety of mysteries. Solve elaborate puzzles and unlock new, increasingly provocative and erotic images.

Gorgeous and detailed graphics: immerse yourself in a world of high-quality and atmospheric images featuring the beautiful Miko, stirring fantasies and evoking real emotions.

Clever and innovative puzzles: solve challenging and interesting puzzles created especially for adult game lovers. Each puzzle is designed to stimulate your imagination and test your logic and observation.

Progression of difficulty: start with simple and easy puzzles and move on to complex and challenging levels.

Subtle and exciting atmosphere: enjoy the seductive soundtrack and relaxing sounds that create the perfect mood.

Discover the world of Puzzle Game: Miko and discover your deep and long-hidden desires. Hone your puzzle-solving skills as you uncover increasingly hot and intriguing scenes. It's time to plunge into an atmosphere of passion and mystery, where each puzzle opens the door to new and unexplored depths of your imagination.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.

name: Puzzle Game: Miko

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 10 64bit, Windows® 8.1 64bit, Windows® 7 SP1 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3550
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
